name: Redneck Mech Mash
description:
I build mecha in real life on youtube and my own website, and decided to start on a fighting game based on them!

I use good ol' redneck ingenuity to build them, thus the "Redneck" in "Redneck Mech Mash"!

Made in GMS2 with the SMF 3d graphics engine and my own fighting engine, this is the basic fighting system with local 2 player (share your keyboard), 1 player vs computer ai of varying difficulties, menu system, level selection.

Future features:
- Multiple fighting character selection & unique combos
- Story-driven visual novel campaign

If you encounter any bugs, be sure to let me know!

Assets used:

3d Engine

SMF engine for GMS2 by TheSnidr

Fighting engine:

Nye Mechworks (me)

Impact Effects

Esteban Díaz
